node.excerpt:
The aim is simple. I wish to boost my overall sense of wellbeing by living a
more fulfilling life day-to-day. I decided it was time to…

Everything I did today was done with intent and slower than usual. I was
mindful. Today I had complete control of my day and my emotions…

When last did you just stop to smell a flower? Or take a peaceful walk
without having to rush for something? Today I sat in standstill…
